https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7g8KhrJNgLn1AfhuYJabl6vjiC2.jpg Norman falls in love with Katia, a beautiful young scientist researching the secret of invisibility to qualify for the Nobel Prize in Chemistry. They travel to Paris in search of Dr. Gervais, a famous French alchemist who knows of an invisibility formula from a medieval legend. Butterscotch: I Am Not a Ghost
